title: 测试音频
content:
I Hate U, I Love U Song MP3
i hate u, i love u (我恨你,我爱你) (Deepend Remix) - Gnash/Olivia O’Brien (奥利维亚·奥布赖恩)
//
Written by：Olivia O’Brien/Garrett
//
Olivia O’Brien：
//
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I love you
我恨我爱着你
Don’t want to but I can’t put
我并不想这样 但我再也无法
Nobody else above you
将别人放在心上
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I want you
我恨你 但我依然想要你
You want her you need her
你想要她 你需要她
And I’ll never be her
而我永远不会是她
Gnash：
//
I miss you when I can’t sleep
失眠的夜 我想着你
Or right after coffee
喝了咖啡 我想着你
Or right when I can’t eat
吃不下饭 我想着你
I miss you in my front seat
我想念你坐在我的前座
Still got sand in my sweaters
我的毛衣里还留有沙子
From nights we don’t remember
多少个夜里已经记不得
Do you miss me like I miss you
你是否像我一样想着我
F**ked around and got attached to you
不顾一切只想和你一起
Friends can break your heart too
朋友也有伤你心的时候
And I’m always tired but never of you
我总是觉得很累 但并不是因为你
If I pulled a you on you
如果我强加于你
You wouldn’t like that
你也不会高兴的
I put this reel out
我把事实托出
But you wouldn’t bite that
而你并不买账
I type a text
我写了简讯
But then I never mind that
我并不在意
I got these feelings
我的这些感受
But you never mind that
你从来不在乎
Oh oh keep it on the low
好吧 不要说了
You’re still in love with me
你还爱着我
But your friends don’t know
但你朋友们却不知道
If u wanted me you would just say so
如果你想要我 你肯定有对朋友说过
And if I were you
如果我是你
I would never let me go
我绝对不会放手让我走
Olivia O’Brien：
//
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I love you
我恨我爱着你
Don’t want to but I can’t put
我并不想这样 但我再也无法
Nobody else above you
将别人放在心上
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I want you
我恨你 但我依然想要你
You want her you need her
你想要她 你需要她
And I’ll never be her
而我永远不会是她
Gnash：
//
I don’t mean no harm
我并没有恶意
I just miss you on my arm
我只是想念你在我怀里
Wedding bells were just alarms
婚礼的钟声刚刚响起
Caution tape around my heart
警示带缠绕着我的心
You ever wonder what we could have been
你有没有想过我们本也可以步入教堂？
You said you wouldn’t and you did
你说过你不想结婚 结果你真的如此
Lie to me lie with me get your fix
骗了我 欺骗着我 该死的复合
Now all my drinks and all my feelings are all mixed
现在酒水掺杂着复杂的感受 头脑混乱不已
Always missing people that I shouldn’t be missing
总是错过不该错过的人
Sometimes you gotta burn some bridges
有时候 必须斩断联系保持距离
Just to create some distance
我知道我该控制住自己的情绪
I know that I control my thoughts
我也该停止回忆
And I should stop reminiscing
但我从爸爸那学到
But I learned from my dad
有这样的感受
That it’s good to have feelings
也是一件好事
When love and trust are gone
当爱与信任 都已经远去
I guess this is moving on
我猜这一切也会过去的
Everyone I do right does me wrong
我认为对的 所有人都认为是错的
So every lonely night I sing this song
所以每一个孤单的夜晚 我唱着这样一首歌
Both：
//
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I love you
我恨我爱着你
Don’t want to but I can’t put
我并不想这样 但我再也无法
Nobody else above you
将别人放在心上
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I want you
我恨你 但我依然想要你
You want her you need her
你想要她 你需要她
And I’ll never be her
而我永远不会是她
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I love you
我恨我爱着你
Don’t want to but I can’t put
我并不想这样 但我再也无法
Nobody else above you
将别人放在心上
I hate you I love you
我恨你 我爱你
I hate that I want you
我恨你 但我依然想要你
You want her you need her
你想要她 你需要她
And I’ll never be her
而我永远不会是她
